events.name: Movie Night
events.description: It's Lucien's movie night. Are you excited?

events.name: Lecture
events.description: Learn about the Salem Witch Trials from our own Salem Witch, Thomas Vallor (@SalemWitchWiles)

events.name: Cooking Workshop
events.description: Learn from @TheSatanicChef about living deliciously in the kitchen. Sessions will occur every 30 minutes or so.

events.name: Grand Ballroom DJ Set
events.description: Enjoy music in the Grand Ballroom from Kadam

events.name: Bats in the Belfry
events.description: Meet your new best friend, a fruit bat or insect bat from BatWorld, a shelter in Texas that cares for these sweethearts. Learn more about their work at batworld.org

events.name: Sleeping Porch
events.description: Lounge among slumbering cats on the sleeping porch, live from Best Friends Animal Society. Learn more about these cats and how you can adopt one at BestFriends.org.

events.name: Parrots in the Aviary
events.description: Get to know some amazing parrots in the Aviary, broadcasting live from Best Friends Animal Society. Learn how to adopt one at BestFriends.org.

events.name: Den Pups
events.description: Puppies are afoot in The Den, live from Best Friends Animal Society. Learn how to adopt one at BestFriends.org.

events.name: Library
events.description: The Satanic Panic Archive Library is open all night. Many of these texts exist nowhere else in the world.
